member.name: P:LiveTools.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:LiveTools.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:LiveTools.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.BulkEditGridView
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.CreateRow(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState)
member.summary: Modifies the creation of the row to set all rows as editable.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.InitializeRow(System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow,System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField[])
member.summary: Adds event handlers to controls in all the editable cells.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.AddChangedHandlers(System.Web.UI.ControlCollection)
member.summary: Adds an event handler to editable controls.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.HandleRowChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This gets called when a row is changed. Store the id of the row and wait to update until save is called.

member.name: P:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.SaveButtonID
member.summary: Setting this property will cause the grid to update all modified records when this button is clicked. It currently supports Button, ImageButton, and LinkButton. If you set this property, you do not need to call save programatically.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Attaches an eventhandler to the onclick method of the save button.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.RecursiveFindControl(System.Web.UI.Control,System.String)
member.summary: Looks for a control recursively up the control tree. We need this because Page.FindControl does not find the control if we are inside a masterpage content section.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.SaveClicked(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the save event, and calls the save method.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.Save
member.summary: Saves any modified rows. This is called automatically if the SaveButtonId is set.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.InsertRow(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prepares the event and calls insert on the DataSource.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.DataSourceViewInsertCallback(System.Int32,System.Exception)
member.summary: Callback for the datasource's insert command.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.OnRowInserting(LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.GridViewInsertEventArgs)
member.summary: Fires the event.

member.name: E:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.RowInserting
member.summary: Event fires when new row has been edited, and save is clicked.

member.name: P:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.InnerTable
member.summary: Access to the GridView's inner table.

member.name: P:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.EnableInsert
member.summary: Enables inline inserting. Off by default.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.OnPagePreLoad(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: We have to recreate our insert row so we can load the postback info from it.

member.name: M:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.CreateInsertRow
member.summary: Creates the insert row and adds it to the inner table.

member.name: P:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.GridViewInsertEventArgs.NewValues
member.summary: Gets a dictionary containing the revised values of the non-key field name/value pairs in the row to update.

member.name: P:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB.GridViewInsertEventArgs.RowIndex
member.summary: Gets the index of the row being updated.

member.name: T:LiveTools.BulkEditGridViewVB
member.summary: BulkEditGridView allows users to edit multiple rows of a gridview at once, and have them all saved.
